example.name: transitive
example.text: `` And God help anyone who [*T*-1]-2 tries [*-2] to unteach you '' ! ! Grumbled [*T*-3] Michelangelo ; ; yet he knew that he had nothing [0] [*] to grumble about [*T*-4] , for Argiento made few demands on him .
